channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.description: 【In today's world, distributed systems have become ubiquitous, powering everything from social media platforms and e-commerce websites to financial systems and healthcare applications.】在当今世界，分布式系统已经无处不在，为从社交媒体平台和电子商务网站到金融系统和医疗保健应用程序的一切提供动力。
